name: qr-creator-ssr
description: Lightweight QR code generator for stylish QR codes
author: Nimiq (www.nimiq.com) / SSR changes by whjvenyl

scripts.build:
google-closure-compiler --js=src/qr-creator.js --js_output_file=dist/qr-creator.min.js --language_in=ECMASCRIPT6 --language_out=ECMASCRIPT6 --rewrite_polyfills=false --compilation_level=ADVANCED --create_source_map=dist/qr-creator.min.js.map && cp dist/qr-creator.min.js dist/qr-creator.es6.min.js && echo -e '//# sourceMappingURL=qr-creator.min.js.map' >> dist/qr-creator.min.js && echo -e 'export default QrCreator;
//# sourceMappingURL=qr-creator.min.js.map' >> dist/qr-creator.es6.min.js
